name: Camacho - Corojo BXP - Toro
additionalNotes: The Camacho Corojo BXP is the original Camacho Corojo with a twist - it's box-pressed! That's not all, however. In addition to its new straight-edged construction, Camacho has also added select Pennsylvania Broadleaf to the filler, effectively intensifying both the flavor and the aroma of the familiar blend. That said, the Camacho Corojo BXP retains the spirit of the formidable and revered cigar that countless smokers worldwide swear by.
